description: Several roads will be closed for the 10K and half marathon on Sunday.
title: North Lincolnshire 10K race road closures announced
title_page: North Lincolnshire 10K race road closures announced - BBC News
maintext:
Several roads will be closed on Sunday to ensure the safety of runners in the North Lincolnshire 10K and half marathon.
Hundreds of people are expected to take part in the event which will start at Quibell Park on Brumby Wood Lane, Scunthorpe.
The 10K race will start at 09:00 GMT and the half marathon will get under way at 09:40.
Scotter Road, Brumby Wood Lane, Burringham Road and Farmers Lane are the main roads expected to be affected from early morning until about 13:00.
